title: Schumann - Scenes from Goethe's Faust / Bernius, Kaune, Klepper, Stuttgart Classical Philharmonic [DVD]
description: The live concert was recorded in 1999 at the magnificent 500 year old gothic Amandus Church in Germany, celebrating the 250th anniversary of Goethe' s birth with a program of scenes of his masterpiece FAUST set to music by Robert Schumann. The imaginative and mysterious subject of Goethe's Faust inspired Schumann to create this work and it is considered among Schumann's best compositions.
Frieder Bernius conducts the renowned Klassische Philharmonie Stuttgart and the Chamber Choir Stuttgart.
DVD Options: Music analysis in subtitles Choral text in subtitles Performer Profiles Liner Notes Glossary
Audio playback options: 5.1 dolby digital Non-compressed stereo.
